SEARCH

Class MonteCarloSimulation

java.lang.Object
MonteCarloSimulation
public class MonteCarloSimulation extends Object
This is a montecarlo simulation that uses pokemon cards as a theme We are figuring out the probability of a pokemon being drawn into hand the hand of 7 is drawn from a deck of 60 we will increment the amount of pokemon for each number of tests

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    MonteCarloSimulation()
    This constructs the deck and hand we start the deck with one pokemon

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Card
    drawCard()
    draws random card from deck the drawn card is removed from the deck when drawn, the random card is returned
    void
    drawHand()
    draws a hand of 7 using drawCard method
    void
    drawPrizePile()
    Draws the prize pile for the player Uses loop to draw the 6 cards
    boolean
    evaluateOpeningHand()
    evaluates if a pokemon is in hand
    boolean
    evaluatePrizePile()
     
    void
    runMonte()
    engine for the program/simulation constructs a deck for each pass of the loop initializes count to zero calls function to add amount of pokemon with i as parameter for each pass of the amount of pokemon loop, it runs 1000000 times clears and drawns new hand for each pass to account missing cards and odds increments one count for each time a pokemon is in hand turns the count to percent.
    void
    runMonteToo()
     

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • MonteCarloSimulation

      public MonteCarloSimulation()
      This constructs the deck and hand we start the deck with one pokemon

  • Method Details

    • drawCard

      public Card drawCard()
      draws random card from deck the drawn card is removed from the deck when drawn, the random card is returned
      Returns:
      returns a card that is drawn from the deck

    • drawHand

      public void drawHand()
      draws a hand of 7 using drawCard method

    • evaluateOpeningHand

      public boolean evaluateOpeningHand()
      evaluates if a pokemon is in hand
      Returns:
      returns the boolean value if a pokemon is in the hand

    • drawPrizePile

      public void drawPrizePile()
      Draws the prize pile for the player Uses loop to draw the 6 cards

    • evaluatePrizePile

      public boolean evaluatePrizePile()

    • runMonte

      public void runMonte()
      engine for the program/simulation constructs a deck for each pass of the loop initializes count to zero calls function to add amount of pokemon with i as parameter for each pass of the amount of pokemon loop, it runs 1000000 times clears and drawns new hand for each pass to account missing cards and odds increments one count for each time a pokemon is in hand turns the count to percent.

    • runMonteToo

      public void runMonteToo()
